descript.abstract: Variable Name (Sampling): SST, normalized (Winter) ID: 44 Region: Bering Sea: Pribilof Islands Area Data Type: Ocean Units: degC Lon.:172W Lat.: 57N Start Year: 1965 End Year: 1997
descript.purpose: The Unaami Data Collection is an interdisciplinary, diverse collection of Arctic variables which represent different geographic regions and data types. It includes basic physical meteorological and oceanographic data and "impact data" such as fisheries, marine mammals, ozone and plant changes.

idinfo.accconst: Please acknowledge the Unaami Data Collection and the original source of the data.

NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
